ack.p: Authors thank Jason Abbott and Jim Hermann for the generous gift of seed of quinoa variety ‘Jessie’ and providing information on the genetics of the variety. We also thank the U.S. National Plant Germplasm System–North Central Plant Introduction Station for seed of quinoa ‘QQ74’. In addition, we thank Frank Morton for information on the genetics of ‘Red Head’. This work is part of the doctoral dissertation of Nourolah Soltani, “Genome-enabled analysis of Quercus rubra-ozone and Chenopodium quinoa-cucumber mosaic virus interactions” (University of Tennessee).
